originally workers, one of who had recently been promoted to be shop
director, and another who was recently promoted to be a procuring agent.
They had a workers' congress, but this was nothing special. It was
a meeting led by the party to open a movement, and consisted of activist
model workers. They were all advanced workers.
They had a system of rotating manual labor for the staff, but nothing
special. Each was supposed to do manual labor l-2 times each week if their
administrafive responsibilities were completed. This was not a rigidly
They had shop directors, below which were group leaders, and also
workers who were appointed materials 'yuan', safetymen, and attendance
At the top of the plant was the party branch, led by the party
branch secretary, below which were several departments, and 2 party
small groups, each with its own leader.
